author: Simon Difford
description: As befits the name, this chocolate and vanilla vodka-based Easter Egg of a cocktail has both cream and egg – the later in the form of Dutch advocaat.
name: Creme Egg Cocktail
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Licor 43 (or other spiced vanilla liqueur)
15 ml White crème de cacao liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
